QuestData.Title: Discovery Requires Experimentation
QuestData.Description: I can sense residues of magic all over you. You will be useful.$b$bI must study how the demon bodies can handle the fel energies in such large quantities. I have plenty of flesh to sample, but there must be something...$b$bGo retrieve some spines from the nearby basilisks so that I may analyze their magical residues. No sense in both of us getting our hands dirty, is there?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 8 Felfire Spines from Felfire Basilisks.
QuestData.CompletionText: I hope you brought enough. I will require more energy before my studies are complete.
QuestData.RewardText: Fel magic is... strange. Almost slippery like an oil, and it burns long and hot. Maybe there's a connection...
